I

IPiece - Class in <Unnamed>
This class constructs the I tetromino & it's 4 rotations!
IPiece() - Constructor for class IPiece
 
isFilled(int, int, int) - Method in class Piece
this method checks, for a given degree of rotation (which we divide by 90 in order to get the corresponding rotation we can pass into our 4x4x4 array), if the piece at the particular index [row][col] is true
isRoundDone - Variable in class TetrisBoard

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TetrisGameTextApplication
runs the game controller
movePieceDown() - Method in class TetrisBoard
moves a piece one row down (as long as it's a valid move)
movePieceLeft() - Method in class TetrisBoard
moves piece to the left by decrementing the column by 1
movePieceRight() - Method in class TetrisBoard
moves piece to the right by incrementing the column by 1

O

OPiece - Class in <Unnamed>
This class creates the 4 rotations of the OPiece using a 3D array (even though they're all exactly the same! It's more for the uniformity of the design of the pieces.)
OPiece() - Constructor for class OPiece
 

P

Piece - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a superclass for the 7 different Tetromino's! It initializes the 3D piece array, handles rotation, and checks where in the 3D array a block of the piece is present
Piece() - Constructor for class Piece
 
piece - Variable in class Piece
variable declaration for a 3D array (3D to hold the number of rotations, as well as the 2D representation of the piece at each rotation)
pieceRotation - Variable in class TetrisBoard
 
printBoard() - Method in class TetrisView
 
printView() - Method in class TetrisBoardTextView
prints the whole view of our tetris board, including scores and line breaks

R

rotateCCW() - Method in class TetrisBoard
rotates the piece counter-clockwise by decrementing the rotation variable, ensuring it doesnt go below 0 degrees
rotateCW() - Method in class TetrisBoard
rotates the piece clockwise by increasing the rotation value (that is often passed into the pieces .isFilled() method, making sure the value of the rotation doesn't exceed 270 degrees
